properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 5:07AM EST until January 13 at 3:10PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio...

Portage River At Woodville
Sandusky River At Tiffin
Sandusky River Above Fremont
Killbuck Creek Near Killbuck
Eagle Creek Above Findlay
Huron River Near Milan
Blanchard River Near Findlay
Maumee River Near Grand Rapids
Maumee River At Waterville
Scioto River Near Larue
Scioto River Near Prospect

The flood warning continues for
The Blanchard River Near Findlay.
* From tonight until Monday afternoon.
* At  4:00 AM Saturday the stage was...7.6 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by tonight and rise to near 12.5
feet by Sunday afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage by
Monday morning.
* At 12.0 feet... Water impacts River Street and Apple Alley on the west
side of Findlay, Blanchard Street between Sandusky and Main Cross, and
several streets south of Clinton Court near Riverside Park.
properties.instruction:
Never drive your car through flooded roadways. The water may be
deeper than it appears. Turn around...don't drown!

Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and other local media for further
details and updates.
